title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Connectionist-Based Science MOOC Design and Operational Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary science education experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: They can independently design one science MOOC scenario based on connectivist learning principles using visual authoring tools.
They can implement and validate a blended learning environment integrating online-offline activities using the MOOCAT tool.
A project-based assessment system incorporating peer feedback can be designed to enhance learner connectivity
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
